name: iOS
body:
# iOS This is where I will post my iOS work as a part of my playing with it and learning programme. #Projects
.: Project :. .: Short Description :.
Project 1 ImageViewer with share
Project 2 Game: Guess the Flag
Project 4 Secured web browser
Project 5 Game: Word Scramble
Project 7 JSON Parser with GCD
Project 8 Game: 7 Little Words
Project 10 Names with Faces - with Save
Project 11 Game: Pachinko
Project 13 Photos with Filters
Project 14 Game: Whack-a-Penguin
Project 15 Playing with animations
Project 16 Safari Extension
Project 17 Game: Boss Ninja Slice
Project 18 Playing with iAd
Project 19 iOS Maps
Project 20 Fireworks with Shake gesture
Project 21 Local Notifications
Project 22 Locating iBeacons
Project 23 Game: Space Race
Project 24 Playing with extensions
Project 25 Selfie Share over Multipeer Connection
Project 26 Game: Marble Maze with tilt
